alert.note: Alert for Culebra (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued June 05 at 5:34AM ADT until June 06 at 5:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Prolonged periods of dangerously hot temperatures and high humidity possible with heat indices ranging from 108 to 113 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Culebra * WHEN...For the excessive heat warning, from 10 AM this morning until 5 PM AST this afternoon. For the excessive heat watch, through Tuesday afternoon. Highest heat indices will be felt between 12-5 pm AST each day. * IMPACTS...High temperatures and humidity that may cause heat illnesses to occur. Heat exhaustion or heat stroke likely with prolonged exposure or strenuous activity.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
